title: Mattsu to Yanma to Moburi-san: Nanatsu no Hihou to Soratobu Oshiro
synopsis: Mattsu and Yamma are two boys who live in Matsuyama. Their favourite pastime is looking for "the seven wonders of Matsuyama".
related_anime: ['Mattsu to Yanma to Moburi-san 2: Suigun Otakara to Nazotoki no Shimajima']
